Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) ► belonged to Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) and given to David (דָּוִד) before he moved to Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where he was made king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range
= member of the ethnic group Amalek (עֲמָלֵק)

Node.gloss: to advance upon (an area or people)|to make a raid
Node.definition: = action by which a group of armed people makes a sudden move in order to attack the people living there and steal their possessions

= an area of land located in the south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples initially by the Canaanites in Arad (עֲרָד) and the Amelekites (עֲמָלֵקִי) later, the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) ► belonged to Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) and given to David (דָּוִד) before he moved to Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where he was made king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is sometimes associated with being weak and inexperienced, but also with being healthy|= state in which humans are of relatively low esteem
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= state in which a human being has lived for a relatively long time, compared to others

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans kill other humans or animals by throwing rocks at them until they die

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

= large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

= ethnic group living a nomadic existence; ◄ regarded as decendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו) ► regarded as mortal enemies of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ultimately destroyed by Saul (שָׁאוּל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

Node.gloss: to take away|to snatch away|to recover
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from someone else's possession
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is sometimes associated with being weak and inexperienced, but also with being healthy
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= state in which a human being has lived for a relatively long time, compared to others
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= to be too weak to be able to accomplish a certain event; ◄ as a result of weariness
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= stream; ◄ territory of the Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) ► location where some of David (דָּוִד) men rested while the rest continued their pursuit of those who raided Ziklag (צִקְלַג)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= condition of a human or a spirit that is not considered morally good or pure or right; can refer to an individual, a group, or a nation

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= set of particles marking an object or event as a subset of a larger group which has been singled out from among the rest

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
only used in vocatives: = friendly and endearing way to address a man

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= process by which humans receive a portion of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) ► belonged to Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) and given to David (דָּוִד) before he moved to Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where he was made king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= causative action by which humans or deities send an object to (other) humans, usually through the mediation of a messenger

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= objects, ◄ presented as gift by one person to another
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town, also known as Bethul (בְּתוּל) and Bethuel (בְּתוּאֵל) ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

m.definition: = town, also known as Ramath Negeb (רָמָה) ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון)

= an area of land located in the south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples initially by the Canaanites in Arad (עֲרָד) and the Amelekites (עֲמָלֵקִי) later, the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.definition: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= descendant of Jerahmeel (יְרַחְמְאֵל) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= ethnic group; ◄ possibly descendants of Cain (קַיִן) ► ally of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) associated with Moses (מֹשֶׁה) father in law
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town, ◄ also known as Ashan (עָשָׁן) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) or Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) exact location unknown; ► for Levites; received part of the loot that David (דָּוִד) took on his raids
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination

= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
